description: [IPsec Helper](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1132) can identify the process it is currently running under and its number, and pass this back to a command and control node.(Citation: SentinelOne Agrius 2021)

external_references.description: Amitai Ben & Shushan Ehrlich. (2021, May). From Wiper to Ransomware: The Evolution of Agrius. Retrieved May 21, 2024.
